comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST2A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST2A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST2A model. Some static systems utilize both current and voltage sources (generator terminal quantities) to comprise the power source.  The regulator controls the exciter output through controlled saturation of the power transformer components.  These compound-source rectifier excitation systems are designated Type ST2A and are represented by ExcIEEEST2A.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 7.2.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efdmax
contents.comment: Maximum field voltage (E).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 120. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 1.82. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gains (K).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 4.88. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: uelin
contents.comment: UEL input (UELin). true = HV gate false = add to error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator outputs (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
